37045.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「北東にゃあ エ:
In the northeast, there is a huge salt lake where you can extract salt called Eze Salt. I'll let you listen to our

39066.<pc>は ツボの中から\nエゼソルト（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me_6:
<pc> received Eze Salt (Key
Item) from the pot!<me_60>

37111.「北東にゃあ エゼソルトっつー塩を採取できる\n 巨大な 塩湖があるだよ～。\n:
In the northeast, there is a huge salt lake where you can extract salt called Eze Salt. Are you the messenger of
Chief Cliffgain of Rangao Village? It's been a long time since the village king sent an errand boy to
collect salt! As soon as you enter Salt Lake, there is a salt tower. There's a pot of good salt nearby, so
feel free to take it with you. The salt tower is conspicuous, so it's easy to see. Be careful when you go
there.

37112.「塩湖に入ると すぐに 塩の塔があるだよ。\n その近くのツボに いい塩が入って:
As soon as you enter Salt Lake, there is a salt tower. There's a pot of good salt near there, so feel free to take
it with you. The salt tower is conspicuous, so it's easy to spot. Be careful when you go there.
